numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that more legacy applicants are admitted than non-legacy applicants.
2. I wonder how many admitted people actually attend this college.
3. This topic is relevant to me.
4. This topic is relevant to my community.
6. This information shows my chances of admission.
7. My chances of admission depend on whether I am a legacy applicant.
8. My caption is "How the rich grow richer".
